title: Graves Challange error?
body: I'm up to getting 500 total minions on graves challange and it's not changing, i've played ARAM and normal rifts, played as Graves and other champions and it still sits at 0/500, anyone else having issues? or any ideas how to complete it?

replies.body: I have the same problem with the tf challenge but all of my games are in my match history. It's just not counting anything towards the challenges.

Same problem for me.
Like you, I've played both ARAM and some Rift games.
Towers update but minions sit at 0/500
now that you mention it my last atleast 6 games arn't on my match history, thanks

ive seen a few others saying other challenges arent working but matchs arent on match history. I checked mine and last 2 games arent up so minions havnt counted.
Im guessing once the client stops having a hissy fit and matchs update minions will count, Taking up to 4 hours from what ive seen
I have the same problem got the towers easy but minions wont update
So it turns out you have to finish 10/10 aram turrets and only then will it count towards your minion progress. Found out on another post.
